DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study learn whether combination two research-proven program , responsive caregiving parent program childhood obesity prevention program , effect toddler ' healthy nutrition physical activity behavior . Investigators hypothesize child participate intervention significantly low BMI z-scores , low intake sugar sweeten beverage , increase number serving fruit vegetable , minute physical activity .
DOC.brief_title: PALS-CATCH Intervention Obesity Prevention Among At-risk Toddlers
DOC.criteria: child 2 3 year time enrollment child > 85th percentile BMI ability parent speak read English 4th grade level provide primarily inhome care child time enrollment child Medicaid eligible acute secondary complication obesity child ( e.g. , severe respiratory insufficiency ) child endocrine abnormality child severe obesity ( > 99.5th BMI percentile ) child participate obesity treatment program within past year parent significant sensory impairment ( e.g . deaf , blind ) parent BMI > 40.0
